text: Sir Michael Ogio (7 July 1942 - 18 February 2017) was a Papua New Guinean politician. He served as the ninth Governor-General of Papua New Guinea from 20 December 2010 until his death. He was leader of the People's Democratic Movement party. Ogio died on 18 February 2017 in Port Moresby, at the age 74. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Governors-General of Papua New Guinea
title: Michael Ogio
